products.title: Aloe Vera Plant
products.description: Releases oxygen at night while absorbing carbon dioxide and certain toxins. An air purifying plant that's a moisturizer, anti-inflammatory, wound healing, acne treatment.

products.title: Money Tree Plant
products.description: Improves air quality, potential stress reduction, and an air purifying plant that is believed to bring good luck and prosperity, making them a popular choice for homes and offices.

products.title: Peace Lily Plant
products.description: Purifies indoor air by removing toxins and mold spores, increasing humidity, and potentially promoting better sleep and a more calming environment.

products.title: Rosemary Plant
products.description: Aides in hairgrowth, supports brain health, improves memory and cognitive function, acts as an antioxidant herb and anti-inflammatory agent, and aides in digestion.

products.title: Lavender Plant
products.description: An herb that promotes relaxation, improves sleep quality, alleviates anxiety, and provide some insect repellent properties.

products.title: Mint Plant
products.description: Helps with digestive health, an herb that reduces allergic symptoms, and soothes common cold symptoms.

products.title: Sunflower Plant
products.description: A flower plant that improves heart health, diabetes management, enhanced immunity, and skin benefits.

products.title: Rose Plant
products.description: This flower plant treats inflammation, diabetes, dysmenorrhea, depression, stress, seizures, and aging

products.title: Hibiscus Plant
products.description: An antioxidant properties holding flower that regulates blood pressure, and promotes weight loss through tea consumption.
